product_backlog.title: As a new patient, I can securely register an account using my phone number and OTP, so I can access the portal.
As a registered patient, I can log in to my VaidyaLink portal account, so I can manage my health information.
As a patient, I can view a list of my uploaded lab reports, so I can keep track of my medical history.
As a patient, I can open and view my lab reports in PDF format, so I can review the details.
As a patient, I can send an encrypted text message to my assigned doctor, so I can communicate about my health.
As a patient, I can view my historical message conversations with my assigned doctor, so I can recall past discussions.
As a patient, I can receive encrypted text messages from my assigned doctor, so I stay informed.
As a doctor, I can log in to my VaidyaLink portal account, so I can manage my patients and their records.
As a doctor, I can view a dashboard displaying a list of my assigned patients, so I can quickly access their information.
As a doctor, I can view incoming messages from my patients on the dashboard, so I can respond promptly.
As a doctor, I can send an encrypted text message reply to a patient, so I can communicate effectively.
As a doctor, I can upload a new PDF prescription for a specific patient, so their records are complete.
As a doctor, I can add relevant tags (e.g., date, medication type) to an uploaded prescription, so it's easily searchable and organized.
As a system administrator, I need the system to ensure all patient data at rest is encrypted, so we comply with HIPAA guidelines.
As a system administrator, I need the system to securely store and retrieve all PDF reports and prescriptions, so data integrity is maintained.
As a system administrator, I need the system to manage user authentication securely using JWT tokens, so only authorized users can access the portal.
As a patient, I need the patient-facing UI to meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility standards, so I can use the portal regardless of my abilities.
